title: Me & The Nominees
description:
Kirk returns in studio with Chris Klemmer after both overcoming the Magnolia variant of Covid-19. Former intern Justin Trudell is producing as Cullinane is out as his family battles the same illness. At A Theater Near Me may be no more and "365 in 365" is off the table, but Chris has an idea for a new podcast where he talks about best picture nominees from pre-1960, Me & The Nominees. (10:00) More accusations are made about Christian Arcand's sexual habits on 98.5. (21:30) Kevin Cullen is still writing articles about the Boston Marathon for the Globe. (43:10) Chris brings back the DEC Yelp review game (1:07:10) A check in with how Dave is dealing with his sick kids and more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
